summary: Adds basic items and equipment to the Warden's Chest in Helgen Keep.
descriptionHtml:
It can be annoying to go through Helgen Keep without even the most basic items you need for your particular build. Very, very annoying... 

This mod adds basic items to the Warden's Chest (the chest Hadvar tells you to get armor from). 

Items include: a full set of imperial heavy and light armor and an imperial sword, all the iron weapons, a long bow and arrows, and a candlelight, fury, and conjure familiar spell tome.

Update: Added a new file that adds Iron and Hide armor to the chest instead of Imperial gear.
author: Aestherus

files.name: Better Warden's Chest
files.changelogHtml: Added an iron dagger to the chest as to not make a liar out of my poor description.

files.name: Better Warden Chest - No Imperial Gear
files.fileName: Better Warden Chest - No Imperial Gear-70088-1-0.rar
